headline.main: Milone's 7 Innings, Sano's Blast Lift Twins Over White Sox
headline.print_headline: Milone's 7 Innings, Sano's Blast Lift Twins Over White Sox

docs.snippet: Tommy Milone struck out seven in seven innings and Miguel Sano hit another monster home run to help the Minnesota Twins beat the Chicago White Sox 3-0 on Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tommy Milone struck out seven in seven innings and Miguel Sano hit another monster home run to help the Minnesota Twins beat the Chicago White Sox 3-0 on Wednesday night.

headline.main: Former Chinese President at War Parade Amid Infighting Rumors
headline.print_headline: Former Chinese President at War Parade Amid Infighting Rumors

docs.snippet: Former Chinese president Jiang Zemin appeared in public on Thursday at a military parade marking 70 years since the end of World War Two in Asia, after rumors of destabilizing infighting in the ruling Communist Party....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Chinese president Jiang Zemin appeared in public on Thursday at a military parade marking 70 years since the end of World War Two in Asia, after rumors of destabilizing infighting in the ruling Communist Party.

headline.main: Redskins GM's Wife Apologizes for Tweet About Reporter
headline.print_headline: Redskins GM's Wife Apologizes for Tweet About Reporter

docs.snippet: The wife of Washington Redskins general manager Scot McCloughan has apologized for "disparaging" and "unfounded" comments on her Twitter account about an ESPN reporter....
docs.lead_paragraph: The wife of Washington Redskins general manager Scot McCloughan has apologized for "disparaging" and "unfounded" comments on her Twitter account about an ESPN reporter.

headline.main: Psychiatrist for Colorado Movie Gunman Thought Mental Hold Might 'Inflame' Him
headline.print_headline: Psychiatrist for Colorado Movie Gunman Thought Mental Hold Might 'Inflame' Him

docs.snippet: A University of Colorado psychiatrist who treated convicted theater gunman James Holmes decided against placing him on a mental health hold after he expressed homicidal thoughts because it might "inflame him," police documents showed on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A University of Colorado psychiatrist who treated convicted theater gunman James Holmes decided against placing him on a mental health hold after he expressed homicidal thoughts because it might "inflame him," police documents showed on Wednesday.

headline.main: Tejada Has Inside-The-Park HR; Harvey, Mets Top Phillies 9-4
headline.print_headline: Tejada Has Inside-The-Park HR; Harvey, Mets Top Phillies 9-4

docs.snippet: Ruben Tejada hit an inside-the-park homer and drove in four runs to back Matt Harvey as the New York Mets returned to their winning ways against the Philadelphia Phillies with a 9-4 victory Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ruben Tejada hit an inside-the-park homer and drove in four runs to back Matt Harvey as the New York Mets returned to their winning ways against the Philadelphia Phillies with a 9-4 victory Wednesday night.

headline.main: China Puts on Huge Show of Force at Parade, to Cut Troop Levels
headline.print_headline: China Puts on Huge Show of Force at Parade, to Cut Troop Levels

docs.snippet: China put on its biggest display of military might on Thursday in a parade to commemorate victory over Japan in World War Two, an event shunned by most Western leaders but which underscored Beijing's growing confidence in its armed forces....
docs.lead_paragraph: China put on its biggest display of military might on Thursday in a parade to commemorate victory over Japan in World War Two, an event shunned by most Western leaders but which underscored Beijing's growing confidence in its armed forces.

headline.main: China Marks Japan WWII Defeat, Shows Rising Power in Parade
headline.print_headline: China Marks Japan WWII Defeat, Shows Rising Power in Parade

docs.snippet: China's leader presided over a parade of tanks, missiles and troops that displayed growing military might Thursday as fighter jets roared overhead, but pledged a 300,000 reduction in troops in a bid to show his country poses no expansionist threat...
docs.lead_paragraph: China's leader presided over a parade of tanks, missiles and troops that displayed growing military might Thursday as fighter jets roared overhead, but pledged a 300,000 reduction in troops in a bid to show his country poses no expansionist threat.

headline.main: BOJ's Kiuchi Warns Japan Won't Hit Inflation Goal for Another 2-1/2 Yrs
headline.print_headline: BOJ's Kiuchi Warns Japan Won't Hit Inflation Goal for Another 2-1/2 Yrs

docs.snippet: Japan is unlikely to see inflation hit the central bank's 2 percent target over the next 2-1/2 years as consumer spending remains weak and China's slowdown hurts exports, Bank of Japan board member Takahide Kiuchi said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Japan is unlikely to see inflation hit the central bank's 2 percent target over the next 2-1/2 years as consumer spending remains weak and China's slowdown hurts exports, Bank of Japan board member Takahide Kiuchi said on Thursday.
